options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant with the goal of building a Magic: The Gathering deck.

<specifics>
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.prompt }}
<specifics>

Create a prompt for vector store card retrieval with sufficient keywords matching the input prompt deck type.

Respond in a similar format to this:
"A red goblin with mana cost 2 and rush"

Ensure to only respond with a single item and characteristics of what this item should have.

parameters.toolDescription:
TOOL
Call qdrant tool: qdrant_retrieve({ query, collection, limit, filter? })
• Searches the hackathon_test vector store.
• Returns: name, pageContent."

## Process (outdated info)
* enrich deck concept, identify theme
* loop over empty card slots
  * switch index: below X land count: add land
  * LLM for identifying signature cards based on best match on overall theme
  * retrieve signature cards (filtered by set, colors, min/max mana)
  * add cards to global memory, max. X cards depending on type
* fill with matching cards or overall powerful cards

assignments.name: global_prompt_template
assignments.value:
=You are a helpful assistant with the goal of building a Magic: The Gathering deck.
Your goal is to build the ultimate deck matchint the following theme:
<target_deck_theme>
{{ $('Switch').item.json.prompt }}
<target_deck_theme>

<color_codes>
Use color codes whenever describing mana colors.
W = white
U = blue
B = black
R = red,
G = Green
</color_codes>

nodes.name: Fill with standard lands, percentage on chosen cards
Set Session ID For Redis Keys

parameters.text:
={{ $('Constants (Redis Keys)1').item.json.prompt }}

You are an expert Magic: The Gathering deck-building assistant.

<target_deck_theme>
{{ $('Constants (Redis Keys)1').item.json.prompt }}
</target_deck_theme>

<format>{{ $('Constants (Redis Keys)1').item.json.format }}</format>
<color_identity>{{ $('Constants (Redis Keys)1').item.json.colors.join(",") }}</color_identity>

<current_decklist>
{{ $json.namePrepared.join("\n") }}
</current_decklist>

<requirements>
• Recommend **exactly one** new card that is not already in <current_decklist>.
• Maintain colour identity, splash colours only if they already appear.
• Favour cards whose converted mana-cost keeps the average CMC ≤ current average.
• Ensure total spells vs. creatures ratio approaches 25 % non-creature spells.
• Avoid exceeding 4 different keyword mechanics in the overall list.
• If suggesting a land, ensure it fixes <color_identity> or improves mana curve.
• Output JSON **only** in this schema (no commentary):

{
  "card_core_concept": "Card core concept",
  "mana_cost": "{mana symbols}",
  "type_line": "Card type",
  "keywords": ["keyword1", "keyword2"],
  "copies": 1-4
}
</requirements>

parameters.content: ## TODO handle combined mana cost for flip cards / rooms, e.g. 7 for https://gatherer.wizards.com/Handlers/Image.ashx?multiverseid=673586&type=card

## Old Prompt

{{ $('Constants (Redis Keys)1').item.json.prompt }}

Suggest only one concept of a card which you would suggest to add to the decklist.
Mention keywords for amount of mana as well as the creature type and specific characteristics which complement the decklist in one string which can be used as prompt.

<current_decklist>
{{ $json.namePrepared.join("\n") }}
</current_decklist>

Propose only new cards, not some on the decklist, but ensure to work towards achieving the target_deck_theme.
Keep the suggestion as short as possible. Do not provide reasoning, only name the prompt.
Use a good mix of rarities, mana curve and types. Do not use more than 4 different mechanics throughout the deck. It is important to also add spells, not only creatures.

Also provide a reasonable count between 1 and 4 of how many times to add the card to the deck.
## TODO min and max mana filter
## Load cards from filesystem after first download

                "text": "If the copied permanent is a token, the token that’s created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created that token, with the stated exceptions."
